description:
JRistrettor tiny portions of Java.

        The 'testeasypom' Parent pom that provides all dependencies that you need for modern testing, generating
        good looking Javadoc and a set of static test reports using spotbugs, pmd, and checkstyle.
        This is NOT cargo-cult, because NONE of the dependencies in this pom will end up in your final product.

        This is a continuation of sebivenlosebipom.
        This project tries to adhere to the development model Tip and  Tail described in JEP 14. (https://openjdk.org/jeps/14)
        There are three tails
        11.0.0 to work with Java version 11 LTS and above
        17.0.0 to work with Java version 17 LTS and above
        21.0.0 to work with Java version 21 LTS and above
        25.0.0 to work with Java version 25 LTS and above
